15 David Lee

Position Utility/Pitcher

Weight 210

Year Senior

B/T R/R

Hometown Pittsburgh, Pa.

High School Thomas Jefferson

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

AWARDS/HONORS

• All-PSAC West Second-Team – 2021 (designated hitter)

• Cal U AD Honor Roll – Spring 2020, Fall 2020, Fall 2021

2022 I JUNIOR

Appeared in 19 games with 15 starts (11 at left field) … finished with a .208 average, two doubles, four RBI and six runs scored … drew one walk, scored one run and stole two bases against Ohio Dominican … tallied a double, one RBI, one run scored and one walk versus Saint Rose … posted an RBI single, one run scored and one walk in Game 2 of doubleheader at Slippery Rock … collected two singles in Game 2 of twinbill against Mercyhurst … registered a double, one RBI, one run scored and one sacrifice fly in Game 2 of doubleheader at Pitt-Johnstown … member of Cal U AD Honor Roll (Fall 2021)

2021 I SOPHOMORE

Selected to All-PSAC West Second-Team … appeared in 37 games with 34 starts (22 at designated hitter, 10 at left field) … finished with a .235 average, three doubles, three triples, four home runs, 15 RBI and 19 runs scored … posted two hits and one run scored in Game 1 of doubleheader against Walsh … tallied a single, one RBI, one run scored, two walks and one steal versus Clarion … registered four hits, two RBI, three runs scored and one hit by pitch in twinbill versus Salem … collected a single, two runs scored and one walk at IUP … belted a three-run homer and drew one walk in Game 2 of doubleheader against Slippery Rock … finished with four hits, including two solo homers, three RBI, four runs scored, one walk and one steal in twinbill versus IUP … posted two hits, two RBI and one walk in Game 1 of doubleheader against Mercyhurst … recorded a solo homer in Game 1 of twinbill versus Seton Hill … member of Cal U AD Honor Roll (Fall 2020)

2020 I REDSHIRT FRESHMAN

Appeared in 11 games with nine starts (four left field, three right field) … finished with a .258 average, two homers and nine RBI … collected three hits and four RBI in Game 1 of doubleheader against Walsh … belted a pair of homers and totaled four RBI at Barton … member of Cal U AD Honor Roll (Spring 2020)

2019 I FRESHMAN

Redshirted

HIGH SCHOOL

Played for Thomas Jefferson under head coach Kevin Gryboski … three-year letter winner

PERSONAL

Son of David and Traci Lee … has one sister … father was selected in the 1995 MLB Draft and played five seasons in the major leagues with Colorado, San Diego and Cleveland … majoring in health science (pre-athletic training)
